review:
I used to chew tobbaco from past 30 years and my mouth opening is very restricted, 
On my very first visit Doctor explained me about further damage which is going to happen if I continue having tobbaco, the way he explained is very nice and his behaviour is very courteous,and very friendly.
While extraction of ü¶∑ he made me very comfortable inspite of himself having to struggle because of my restricted mouth opening.
Very much satisfied with the treatment,
Definitely will suggest this place to family and friends

review: I'm from Bangalore and was not aware of any dentists around chennai. Came across Gloss dental in Google and decided to give it a try. Dr Dinesh is very friendly and will answer all your questions patiently. I might have thrown a barrage of questions to him on the treatment but he explained everything in layman's language. I was also impressed by the staff there. I highly recommend Dr Dinesh. You can blindly trust him and go for the treatment.
